Member Function Documentation

virtual const int ctk::Exception::reason (  )  const throw () [inline, virtual]

Returns the CTK error code if the exception was caused by error

void ctk::Exception::trace ( std::ostream &  os = std::cout  )  [inline]

Outputs the stack trace info to the given ostream (default = std::cout). Include "-rdynamic" in the compiling options to get some readable output.
